transArray.content:
The experience is great. The location is convenient. It takes less than ten minutes to walk to Taikoo Li. There are many small bars next door.
The clerk's service is very good. It turns out that I checked out at 12 o'clock and extended it to 1 o'clock for free.
The room facilities are also very good, the minimalist style is fully functional
Next time I come to Beijing, I will definitely book this place
